name: Click on this task
notes: This is a task! Click the checkbox on the left to complete it, or click outside to close the task. Once you’ve completed a task, you’ll have the option to archive it.

name: Tap this task
notes: This is a task! Tap the checkbox on the left to complete it, or tap outside to close the task. Once you’ve completed a task, you’ll have the option to archive it.

name: Create a new task
notes: Just type your task into the input box at the top - and press enter. You can quickly focus this box by using ⌘J on your keyboard.

name: Create a new task
notes: Just tap the + icon in the bottom corner.

name: Add this task to your Today list
notes: Click the calendar icon in the corner to plan when you’ll do this task. Choose Today to make it show in the Today list.

name: Add this task to your Today list

name: View your other lists
notes: Swipe the bottom drawer up to view and jump into your other lists.

name: Plan this task for later
notes: Click the calendar icon again, and this time choose a date in the future. It’ll appear in your Next list, but also in your Today list when that day comes around.

name: Convert this task to a heading
notes: Click the three dots in the corner, and choose Change to Heading. You can change a heading back to a task at any time.

name: Create a new list

name: You’ve got the basics!
notes:
You’re ready to use Nitro. Feel free to add your own tasks and lists, and you can come back to this list when you’re ready to learn about some of the more advanced features.

To remove this list, tap the three dots in the list header, and choose delete list.

name: Nitro Sync
notes:
Nitro keeps your tasks safe by syncing them to the cloud. You can sign in on any device to manage your tasks from anywhere.

You can also use Nitro offline - if you’re without a connection, you can still visit the app and manage your tasks. They’ll be synced next time you’re connected to the internet.

name: Adding Priorities
notes: Some tasks more important than others? Choose the exclamation icon to choose a priority. It’ll show up next to the task, and Nitro will organize you better.

name: Reordering Tasks & Lists
notes: You can drag and drop to sort the tasks in this list. You can also reorder your list of lists in the same way.

name: Reordering Tasks & Lists
notes: You can long press and drag to sort the tasks in this list. You can also reorder your list of lists in the same way.

name: Magic Sort
notes: Press the sort icon in the top right. Magic Sort considers dates, deadlines, and priorities! Switch back to your custom order by tapping the icon again.

name: Use Quick Search
notes: You can jump into any list, task, or heading using Quick Search. Just press ⌘K and type.

name: Use Quick Search
notes: You can jump into any list, task, or heading using Quick Search. Just tap the search box below.

name: Set a deadline on a task
notes:
You can set a deadline if there’s a date a task needs to be done by. To add a deadline, you can press the flag icon, and choose a date.

A task with a deadline will show in the Next list, and also the Today list when overdue.

name: Keyboard Shortcuts
notes: You can move around the app faster by learning some of Nitro’s keyboard shortcuts. To view these, press the ? key.
